name: TechnoGaia
description:
OVERWORLD CONTROLS

Press the "0" key to get a full view of the planet.

Press the "1" key to rotate to the Waterfall.

Press the "2" key to rotate to the Canyan.

Press the "3" key to rotate to the Scifi.

Press the "Esc" key or "X" UI button to close the game.

If you press the "1" or "2" key then a "PLAY" UI button prompt appears.

Click on PLAY with your mouse to load the respective scene.

When you load a scene, a "HOME" UI button prompt may appear in the top right.

Click on HOME with your mouse to load the home menu scene.

GUN CONTROLS

Press "W" "A" "S" or "D" to move and strafe.

Press "Space Bar" to Jump.

Click the Left Mouse button to fire.

Click the Right Mouse button to hide or show the mouse cursor.

You can move via tank controls using the Arrow Keys.
